item.title: First Impressions and Key Concepts of the Django Python Web Framework
item.description:
First Impressions of Django

Picking up Django felt right. In the past I used other Python web frameworks like web2py and flask. I mostly avoided Django before now because it felt a bit overkill for the smaller toy apps I made in my beginning years as a Python developer. For â€¦
